name: Callosum Protocol
description: Consistency enforcement for multi-agent coordination. Supports local (single-instance) and remote (cross-VM) modes.

mode.description: State backend: 'local' for file-based, 'remote' for shared HTTP server

serverUrl.description: Callosum server URL for remote mode (e.g., http://callosum.internal:7700)

stateDir.description: Directory for local state files (journal, locks, contexts)

timeoutMs.description: HTTP timeout for remote server calls in milliseconds
